author: Caitlin Oprysko
title: Trump teases new coronavirus distancing guidelines based on county risk
description: The president said his administration is preparing to conduct "robust surveillance testing" to determine county-by-county restrictions.
content: It's uncertain how effective such labels might be in containing the virus, however, because asymptomatic carriers could move from region to region undetected. Just this week, the administration urged anyone whodrecently been in New York City, the new epicente… [+1342 chars]
